string.name: stop_device
string.value: Disconnect to stop using this device's %1$s.

string.name: continue_desc_text
string.value: Start viewing or editing content on one device, then continue seamlessly on nearby devices using the same HUAWEI ID. When Handover is available, an icon will appear in the app dock. %s

string.name: continue_privacy_text
string.value: This service uses Bluetooth and WLAN, and needs to send the name of this device to devices you handover to. By turning this on, you agree to these terms.

string.name: update_version_prompt
string.value: Both devices must be running HarmonyOS NEXT.
